**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 48 1.1 **Frequency** once per turn **Prerequisites** [Arcane Cascade](/Actions.aspx?ID=756), [Spellstrike](/Actions.aspx?ID=755) **Requirements** Your most recent action was to Cast a Spell from a spell slot or make a Spellstrike with a spell from a spell slot. --- Your spell has a powerful aftereffect, briefly granting you a certain spell depending on the spell you cast. You use Arcane Cascade and are subject to an additional aftereffect spell depending on the school of your most recent spell. This aftereffect spell's duration lasts until the end of your next turn or its normal duration, whichever is longer. Using Arcane Shroud again ends any existing spell you gained from Arcane Shroud.
  • **Abjuration** [_stoneskin_](/Spells.aspx?ID=312)
  • **Conjuration** [_blink_](/Spells.aspx?ID=27)
  • **Divination** [_see invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=271)
  • **Enchantment** [_heroism_](/Spells.aspx?ID=149)
  • **Evocation** [_fire shield_](/Spells.aspx?ID=118)
  • **Illusion** [_invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (ends after a hostile action, as normal)
  • **Necromancy** [_false life_](/Spells.aspx?ID=108)
  • **Transmutation** [_fleet step_](/Spells.aspx?ID=122)
